property.name: greenplum.master.port
property.description: Port number for Greenplum master and Greenplum standby

property.name: greenplum.segment.base.port
property.description: Base port number for greenplum segments

property.name: greenplum.user.password
property.description: Greenplum Admin Password - If gpadmin user does not exist, the user will be created using the password specified in this field (default: gpadmin). During cluster initialization, ssh keys are exchanged using this password. If gpadmin user already exists, the ssh keys needs to be exchanged manually via command line.

property.name: greenplum.master.directory
property.description: MASTER_DIRECTORY for Greenplum configurations, catalog and metadata

property.name: greenplum.segment.data.directory
property.description: DATA_DIRECTORY for greenplum segment configuration, please input a space delimited list of directories on which hawq segments/node needs to be created. E.g. /data1/primary /data2/primary /data3/primary

property.name: set.os.parameters
property.description: Set to TRUE to enable setting parameters in /etc/sysctl.conf and /etc/security/limits.conf to recommended values for HAWQ

property.name: skip.preinstall.verification
property.description: Set to TRUE if you would like to skip preinstall cluster verification on system parameters and settings, e.g. memory, disk, OS, and port requ irements.

property.name: sysctl.vm.overcommit_memory
property.description: Set this value to 0 for single node clusters or machines with less memory (16 GB or less). Set the value to 2 for production machines with la rge memory.
